field.name: ma_bp
field.check: ma_bp not in (select ma_bp from hrbp)

field.name: ma_nv
field.check: ma_nv not in (select ma_nv from hrnv)

text.v: Cập nhật hệ số theo bộ phận

processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @key nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32) declare @user int, @admin bit, @sys varchar(32), @joinUnit bit, @joinDept bit, @r int select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @sys = '@@sysDatabaseName', @key = '', @joinUnit = 0, @joinDept = 0
-- Checking &Checking; &EndErrorMode;
-- Key if @admin = 0 begin exec AI_ERP$HRM$DeptRightFilter @user, @admin, 'e', 'e', @sys, @key output, @joinUnit output, @joinDept output select @key = dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$GetCheckKey(@key) select @q = 'delete @@table from @@table a where not exists(select 1 from hrbp e where a.ma_bp = e.ma_bp' + case when @key = '' then '' else ' and (' + @key + ')' end + ')' exec sp_executesql @q
if @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'hrCoefficientByDepartment', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end end
-- Gather select top 0 stt_rec, ma_bp, ngay_hl, he_so into #r from hrhsbp select @q = 'insert into #r select e.stt_rec, a.ma_bp, a.ngay_hl, a.he_so' select @q = @q + ' from @@table a join hrnv e on a.ma_nv = e.ma_nv' + case when @key = '' then '' else ' where (' + @key + ')' end exec sp_executesql @q
-- Delete if @type = '0' delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from hrhsbp b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ma_bp = b.ma_bp and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl) select a.stt_rec, a.ma_bp, a.ngay_hl, a.he_so into #k from #r a join hrhsbp b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ma_bp = b.ma_bp and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl delete #r from #r a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ma_bp = b.ma_bp and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl)
-- Insert &Inserting;
-- Update if @type = '1' begin update hrhsbp set @@list from hrhsbp a join #k b on a.stt_rec = b.stt_rec and a.ma_bp = b.ma_bp and a.ngay_hl = b.ngay_hl end
